member.summary: Will merge contacts into another contact. If contacts are from different sites then new global contact will be created.
member.param: Optional. If not specified then new contact will be created
Dataset of ContactInfo objects to be merged
Optional. Hashtable containing result of account-contact collision results. Contains 'AccountID' keys and 'ContactRoleID' values.
Optional. Hashtable containing result of contact groups which should be added to parent contact.

member.param: Optional. If not specified then new contact will be created
List of ContactInfo object to be merged
Optional. Hashtable containing result of collision results. Contains 'AccountID' keys and 'ContactRoleID' values.
Optional. Hashtable containing result of contact groups which should be added to parent contact.
member.returns: If merged contacts are from different sites then newly created contact will be returned. Otherwise contact passed as mergeInto parameter will be returned.

member.name: M:CMS.OnlineMarketing.ContactHelper.Merge(CMS.OnlineMarketing.ContactInfo,CMS.OnlineMarketing.ContactInfo,System.Collections.Hashtable,System.Collections.Hashtable)
member.summary: Merges one contact into another contact. Contacts must be on the same site (or global).
member.param: Will be merging into this contact. Must be on same site as 'mergeFrom' contact or global
Will be merged. Must be as 'mergeInto' contact or global if 'mergeInto' is global
Optional. Hashtable containing result of collision results. Contains 'AccountID' keys and 'ContactRoleID' values.
Optional. Hashtable containing result of contact groups which should be added to parent contact.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if merging was successful.
